CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 23, 1969, pg. 12, reads: "BCC Courtroom Conference - Three key members of the Black Construction Coalition meet shortly after Common Pleas Judge David Fawcett ruled against mass picketing at the Three Rivers Stadium site. Huddling above are, from left, Nate Smith, Operation Dig; Mike Dismond, Bidwell Cultural Training Center, and Percy Travillion. Photo by Harris."
TitMainTitle: Nate Smith, Mike Desmond, and Percy Travillion talking to KDKA reporter George Barbour, in courthouse hallway with Rev. Jim Simms wearing afro and light colored shirt, in background
